feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 4:58PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND LOCALIZED AREAS OF BLOWING AND DRIFTING SNOW THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY... Northeast winds will steadily strengthen across the Matanuska Valley today and then peak late tonight into Wednesday afternoon. Wind gusts are expected to reach 40 to 50 mph late tonight and Wednesday before starting to diminish some Wednesday night.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:13PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FREEZING DRIZZLE IN KOOCHICHING... Freezing drizzle has been observed across the county with more reports upstream to the west.
